title: Site Drawn #15
marks:
Signed, dated, numbered, and chop mark. LR: [Bjorklund 1978]
LL: [A.P. 2/8]
description: Number 15 from a portfolio of 15 prints by 15 artists commissioned by Northwestsern National Bank, Minneapolis, as part of an exhibition \"Portfolio 15: An exhibition by Minnesota Artists,\" held in November 1978 at Northwestern National Bank.
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of funds from The Northern Star Foundation and The Hersey Foundation
